title: Allow importing multi-file GGUF models
summary:
### What is the issue?

Currently Ollama can [import GGUF files](https://github.com/ollama/ollama/blob/main/docs/import.md). However, larger models are sometimes split into separate files. Ollama should support loading multiple GGUF files similar to loading safetensor files.


### OS

_No response_

title: [PR] feat: add LLM-based currency and metadata label evaluation subagents
summary:
# Pull Request

## Summary

- Add **Currency/Line Item Subagent** that evaluates 11 labels (LINE_TOTAL, UNIT_PRICE, PRODUCT_NAME, QUANTITY, etc.) using LLM with line item patterns as context
